00059 #ifndef HEADER_BUFFER_H
00060 #define HEADER_BUFFER_H
00061 
00062 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00063 extern "C" {
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #include <stddef.h>
00067 #include <sys/types.h>
00068 
00069 typedef struct buf_mem_st
00070     {
00071     int length; /* current number of bytes */
00072     char *data;
00073     int max;    /* size of buffer */
00074     } BUF_MEM;
00075 
00076 BUF_MEM *BUF_MEM_new(void);
00077 void    BUF_MEM_free(BUF_MEM *a);
00078 int BUF_MEM_grow(BUF_MEM *str, int len);
00079 int BUF_MEM_grow_clean(BUF_MEM *str, int len);
00080 char *  BUF_strdup(const char *str);
00081 
00082 /* safe string functions */
00083 size_t BUF_strlcpy(char *dst,const char *src,size_t siz);
00084 size_t BUF_strlcat(char *dst,const char *src,size_t siz);
